dublinCore.title: MicroSim Directory Structure
dublinCore.description: Interactive tree diagram showing the standard file organization for MicroSim packages. Visualizes the hierarchical structure from the sims/ root folder through individual MicroSim directories containing index.md, main.html, style.css, script.js, data.json, and metadata.json files. Includes hover-to-reveal descriptions explaining the purpose of each file type.
dublinCore.creator: Dan McCreary

learningObjectives: Describe the standard MicroSim directory structure and naming conventions
Explain the purpose of each file type within a MicroSim package
Distinguish between required, optional, and recommended files
Understand how consistent file organization enables discoverability and reuse
Apply the structure when creating new MicroSims
educational.instructionalMethod: Interactive exploration with guided lesson plan

controls.description: Hover over nodes to see file descriptions in info panel
Pan and zoom controls in bottom corners

userInterface.layout: Tree diagram with info panel overlay on right
